name: Trodly
0:
”Alexa, open trodly”
”What can I do this weekend in Bangalore?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trodly
Developer Terms of Use
des: With Trodly Activities and Tours Travel skill, you can discover and book some of the best adventure activities, unique local experiences, and tours for your holiday trip or weekend getaways at the best price. Search for your trip destination and discover all that you can experience while on the trip. Find out all the necessary details for the activities you want, and continue to Trodly.com to book them. The skill also helps you put specific filters to find out activities that are perfectly suited for you.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
